review_data.title: What a shame I only just found this place
review_data.content: what a great place, if only I'd found it before. super professional and friendly team, amazing beer on tap selection and a really cool, simple but very tasty menu, and well priced too good outdoor area for summer all in all a great REAL place,...More

review_data.title: Great Craft Beer
review_data.content: This is a great bar with a great selection of beers on tap. My husband is the beer drinker not me and I have to say the Ethiopian wine was very drinkable. The food menu is good but limited; ramen or burgers!

review_data.title: Agradable y divertido
review_data.content: Un buen lugar para degustar diferentes cervezas con muy buen ambiente. También se puede comer una rica hamburguesa.

review_data.title: Craft and quality
review_data.content: Super friendly staff, great range of beers and cosy atmosphere. Great sortiment of take home beer as well. If you are in he mood to try something special there is always an option. At the time of this review there was a very balanced beer...More

review_data.title: Great selection and amazingly friendly staff!
review_data.content: Twenty taps with a great variety of local and non-local high quality beers, including plenty of sours and stouts. Great and social staff! Well worth the uphill walk from the city Centre!

review_data.title: Awesome night with good beer selection and awesome Ethiopian food
review_data.content: The Alehouse is a great place to spend your evening with friends enjoying a delicious beer. I went there with my friends when they served Ethiopian dishes - it was amazing! Looking forward to next event there :-) The staff was really friendly and the...More

review_data.title: No kitchen staff - don't go there

review_data.title: Beer paradise(and more)
review_data.content: They have about 20 beers from the tap as well as many other in separate fridges. The place was very quiet with a relaxed terrace in the afternoon. Very friendly staff. I will come back!

review_data.title: Café exceptionnel

review_data.title: Divertido

review_data.title: Quality and variety of Craft Beers
review_data.content: Extensive range of Craft beers of the highest quality. Staff super friendly and tastings readily available.

review_data.title: Amazing beers, disappointing burgers

review_data.title: Through the rain in search of good beer. Found it. Drank it

review_data.title: Cool selection of beers, quite expensive

review_data.title: Superlative beer in the best bar in Zurich

review_data.title: the beer. the food. the games. lovin' it

review_data.title: Great place for a beer (or two)

review_data.title: Awesome pub - great beer and food

review_data.title: Top notch beer selection!
review_data.content: It is always a great surprise how many different beers you can have on tap! All those beers are coming from different parts of the world and you feel delighted to be the one traveling without having any flight :)

review_data.title: Le bar à bieres

review_data.title: Sehr empfehlenswert
review_data.content: Super Essen, feines und nicht alltägliches Bier und sehr coole Leute (Mitarbeiter, Inhaber, Gäste etc.)!

review_data.title: Yummy burgers and great craft ales selection

review_data.title: Beers from around the world!!!
review_data.content: Seriously on of the most diverse beer sections I have ever seen. Greatly beer and wifi without a password, what more do you want?

review_data.title: Meh

review_data.title: Zweiter Besuch

review_data.title: The only Bar in Zurich with extensive Beer list!
review_data.content: This restaurant / bar is just a few minutes walk from the PolyBahn top station. (note the Polybahn does not run after 7pm) or tram from Bahnhof to UniversityStrasse. It opens around 8am but beer not served till midday. At least ten different beers on...More

review_data.title: Great place for different beers
review_data.content: I visited this place with a friend who wanted to show me different beers and this was definitely a great place to taste. The owners are very knowledgable and the vibe was great. We also had a burger, which was very good indeed. We were...More

review_data.title: Great place to bring an Englishman for a taste of a real brew pub
review_data.content: I visited this place on a recommendation of a place to get micro brews. This place closely resembles the brew pubs in the North West U.S.A (and I'm sure across U.S.A). the selection of beer was outstanding, the knowledge of the staff was superb. I...More

review_data.title: Bier vom Feinsten !
review_data.content: Die Auswahl der Biere vom Zapfhahn überzeugt. Es fällt einem schwer zu wählen da alle Biere mit Liebe ausgesucht sind...More

review_data.title: Great little beer house
review_data.content: A dozen craft beers on tap. A simple menu of salads and burgers and by Zurich standards not too pricey. Located near the University, just a ten minute walk or a 3 minute tram ride from Central. Be warned, it's up hill all the way....More

review_data.title: Cool hangout for your craft beer fix
review_data.content: Located close to the university take Tram 9/10 (Universitat/Haldenback). The AleHouse is certain to become a popular hangout. The atmosphere is simple with limited room decorations. There are stools at the bar and the remainder of the room is mostly larger shared tables. There is...More

review_data.title: Great service and selection
review_data.content: We were excited to check this place out as the new owner also owns the Beer Store next door, which features a variety of fantastic bottled imports. I'm partial to sour ales and barley wines, and was delighted to have several options at good prices...More

review_data.title: Die Eröffnung ist gelungen
review_data.content: Das Alehouse ist wirklich einen Abstecher wert. Wir haben verschiedene Sorten Bier ausprobiert und wurden nicht enttäuscht. Der Angus Burger...More

review_data.title: Super craft beer pub!
review_data.content: We were in the pub on the opening. It was full of people! The pub offers more than 20 tap beers from all over the world. If the barrel is finished, it is immediately changed to a different one, therefore pay attention to the names...More

review_data.title: Great Craft Beer Bar
review_data.content: The Alehouse has a great selection of craft beer on tap and new beers get tapped as soon as a beer runs out, which means the selection always changes. The place is conveniently located next to the university of Zurich and ETH Zurich close to...More

review_data.title: Excellent Coffee
review_data.content: Best Cappuccino i had in weeks. Great selection of beers on 20 taps. will defenetly come back soon. good job

review_data.title: Promising place
review_data.content: Was there for the unofficial opening. Looks very promising, wide selection of beers and has a terrace with sunshine in the afternoon. Tried the "tasting" selection, got 4 different beers to try out. Can definitely recommend it.
